description: Unique identifier of the system user whose permissions are managed by the associated security group.
Name of the security/permission group that controls the user's access within the fleet management application.
Identifier of the person or automated process that created this user-group mapping.
Timestamp when this user-group mapping was created (access initially granted).
Identifier of the person or automated process that last changed this user-group mapping.
Timestamp when this user-group mapping was last updated.
